page.title: Liverpool
page.text: Liverpool is a football team associated in Liverpool, England. The club plays in the [[EPL|Premier League]], the highest division of the English league. They have won a total of 6 Champions League European titles. Their current biggest [[rivals]] are [[Manchester City|Man City]].

page.title: Manchester City
page.text: Manchester City is a football team associated in Manchester, UK. They have recently risen to domestic dominance, winning 4 out of the 5 last [[EPL|Premier League]] titles. Some of their best players include [[Kevin de Bruyne]], [[Raheem Sterling]], and [[Bernardo Silva]].

page.title: EPL
page.text: The EPL stands for the English Premier League and is a football league based in the United Kingdom. Some of its most prominent football clubs include Manchester United, [[Liverpool]], [[Manchester City]], [[Arsenal]], [[Tottenham Hotspur]], and [[Chelsea]].
